page-after-signup.validate_email: Your account has been successfully created, validate your email to be able to signin

page-reset-password.new_password: Please enter your new password below.

page-signin.password_error: The password you entered is wrong

page-signup.welcome_back: We are happy to see you !

page-signup.invalid_password: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character

page-totp.error: An error occurred while trying to verify your identity

page-verify-qrcode.success: You have successfully connected to your account
page-verify-qrcode.description: Go back on your main page, you should be authenticated.

select-visibility-modal.additional_details: Tell us a little more about what you want

invite-member-modal.share_code: Share this code id to invite your friends to this private server
invite-member-modal.share_server: Share this server id to invite your friends to this public server

ask-password.title: Enter your password
ask-password.subtitle: Please enter your password to enable 2FA
